content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: coarse_dirt
inventory=[{"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 54, "index": 10}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 10, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 33, "index": 26}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 18, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft coarse_dirt, I need to place dirt and gravel side by side in the crafting table. I will move the dirt from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: coarse_dirt
inventory=[{"type": "dirt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 54, "index": 10}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 10, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 33, "index": 26}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 18, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to move the gravel to the right of the dirt. I will move it from slot 45 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: coarse_dirt
inventory=[{"type": "dirt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 54, "index": 10}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 10, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 33, "index": 26}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 18, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to move the gravel below the dirt. I will move it from slot 45 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: coarse_dirt
inventory=[{"type": "dirt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 54, "index": 10}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 10, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 33, "index": 26}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 18, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I need to move the dirt to the right of the gravel. I will move it from slot 25 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: coarse_dirt
inventory=[{"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 54, "index": 10}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 10, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 33, "index": 26}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 18, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I can craft the coarse_dirt by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
